channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-4492] Revert HIVE-4322
item.description: See HIVE-4432 and HIVE-4433. It's possible to work around these issues but a better solution is probably to roll back the "fix" and change the API to use a primitive type as the map key (in a backwards-compatible manner).

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: sxyuan Can you take a look?

Overall: -1 at least one tests failed

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12602038/HIVE-4492.patch

ERROR: -1 due to 2 failed/errored test(s), 3086 tests executed
Failed tests:

org.apache.hive.hcatalog.mapreduce.TestHCatExternalPartitioned.testHCatPartitionedTable
org.apache.hcatalog.pig.TestHCatLoaderComplexSchema.testSyntheticComplexSchema

Tests passed. May I request a committer to review the patch?
Committed to trunk. Thanks, Samuel for initial patch. Thanks, Carl for review!

This looks like an api backward compatibility fix that we should include in 0.12 . ashutoshc Do you agree ?
This issue has been fixed and released as part of 0.12 release. If you find further issues, please create a new jira and link it to this one.
